content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the most updated information, but I can tell you that Maastricht has several initiatives and incentives for individuals to switch to renewable energy options. The municipality of Maastricht offers subsidies for residents who install solar panels on their homes, and there are also tax incentives for individuals and businesses who invest in renewable energy. Additionally, Maastricht has a program called "Maastricht Energy Collective" that provides support and advice for residents who want to switch to renewable energy. The collective negotiates competitive prices for sustainable energy contracts from various suppliers to help residents make the switch to sustainable energy as affordable as possible.
